column4: is it hard to repair mbr if you installed ubuntu first. then you install windows and need grub back. is it hard to bring back or no?
just use your live cd to boot, then use "sudo chroot /dev/sda1" (or whatever partition your ubuntu install is, and then "sudo grub-install" i think
can you get the reall instructions so im not left out when i go to fix grub
they're online somewhere... just google for grub install
i think there's actually a page on either the ubuntuforums or the ubuntu wiki that explains how to get grub back after windows eats it
yes the one that says RecoveringUbuntuAfter...
on a scale from 1 to 10 ten the hardest what would that tut be
why would you send someone pms?  thats just mean!  once a month is often enough!
how is that mean your tripping
as a girl, i gotta say more pms is a bad thing
someone in #ubuntu-offtopic had to google PMS when i told them what just happened in here
